item.title: Introduction to MicroInventor
item.description: MicroInventor is intentionally written as a set of structured “tutorials.” It is designed both for teachers to plan their lessons and for students to follow the instructions in the lessons in class, in case they get stuck. Before using the curriculum, make sure all software and hardware is set up by following the “Get Started” guide on the left. We will be using the Raspberry Pi 3s as our platform for coding.
